platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Platform at which the train will halt

platFormChanged.title: Changed platform
platFormChanged.description: Indicates whether the platform has changed

arrivalDateTime.title: Arrival date and time
arrivalDateTime.description: Date and time at which the train will arrive at the station, formatted as Month, Day Year Hour:Minute:Second Timezone(+0200). Delay is included in this time

fromDateTime.title: From date and time
fromDateTime.description: Date and time at which the train will depart from the station, formatted as Month, Day Year Hour:Minute:Second Timezone(+0200). Delay is included in this time

arrivalDelay.title: Arrival delay
arrivalDelay.description: Delay in minutes for arrival time

fromDelay.title: Departure delay
fromDelay.description: Delay in minutes for departure time

dataDateTime.title: Updated at
dataDateTime.description: Date and time at which the data was last updated, formatted as Month, Day Year Hour:Minute:Second Timezone(+0200)
